overview: Marjory Clark wins a competition in her Midland town and finds herself in a Festival of Britain procession as Lady Godiva - though not in the buff. This leads by way of a suspect beauty competition to the show-business world of London. But it could be a slippery slope for simple home-town Marge.
tagline: THE COMEDY SIDE OF A BATHING BEAUTY CONTEST!
title: Lady Godiva Rides Again
